name: @geoman-io/maplibre-geoman-free
description: A MapLibre Plugin For Drawing and Editing Geometry Layers

scripts.build: npm --prefix ../.. run build && npm run sync:dist
scripts.sync:dist: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.es.js dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.es.js.map dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.umd.js dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.umd.js.map dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.css dist && shx cp ../../dist/maplibre-geoman.d.ts dist
